title: Has this already been posted?

comments.content:
Marian Bantjes’ website? I think it’s safe to say that it has. :-)

[http://typophile.com/node/18275](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905063723/http:/typophile.com/node/18275 "http://typophile.com/node/18275")

Also, check out this thread about Restraint, a typeface she developed with Ross Mills:

[http://typophile.com/node/38764](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905063723/http:/typophile.com/node/38764 "http://typophile.com/node/38764")

P.S. It’s really helpful to name your thread with a descriptive title, or to mention what you are talking about within your post. Thanks. :-)
